subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Dan Cleary scored twice and Dominik Hasek made 15 saves to help the Detroit Red Wings capture their ninth consecutive victory, 4-1 against the visiting Columbus Blue Jackets.
snippet: Dan Cleary scored twice and Dominik Hasek made 15 saves to help the Detroit Red Wings capture their ninth consecutive victory, 4-1 against the visiting Columbus Blue Jackets.
